    • Method Detail

      • dealCards

        public void dealCards()
        Deals cards to each player.

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        Creates a new game(hand) to be played. Cycles through players in arrayList and clears hands followed by dealing. User starts.

      • hit

        public void hit(Player player)
        Player hit. Takes a card from the deck and deals it to the player requesting hit. Sets score after hit.
        Parameters:
        player - - Player requesting hit. Will add card to his/her hand.

      • getCurrPlayer

        public Player getCurrPlayer()
        Getter method for the current player moving.
        Returns:
        Current player

      • score

        public int score(Player player)
        Scores the hand of the player passed in.
        Parameters:
        player - Player's hand to be scored.
        Returns:
        int value of player's score.

      • scoreHand

        public Player scoreHand()
        Scores each hand to determine a winner.
        Returns:
        Player that won the hand.

      • nextPlayerTurn

        public void nextPlayerTurn()
        Changes turns from user to dealer. Order matters. If 0 compared first, then it is switched and then switched again at next if. Comparison to 1 must come first.

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
        Retrieves an arrayList of players in the game. (Should only ever be user and dealer)
        Returns:
        List of players in game.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Getter method to determine who's turn it is.
